text: Her ongynð seo ðridde boc, ðe is genemned on EbreisUaiccra, &Leuiticuson Grecisc, &Ministerialison Leden, ðæt is ðenungboc on Englis, for ðan ðe ðæra sacerda ðenunga synd ðæron awritene.

Drihten clypode to Moyse on þære halgan wurþungstowe, & ðus cwæð: Sege Israhela bearnum: Gyf hwilc eower wille Gode offrunga bringan of nytenum, þæt is of hryþerum & of sceapum, & seo offrung be þam fullan beon sceole, þonne bringe he of hryþerum an <unwemne> oxancealf to þære halgan stowe dura Drihten myd to gegladienne.
& sette his hand ofer þære offrunge heafod: þonne biþ heo andfenge & fremiende to his clænsunge.
Ofrie þonne þæt cealf beforan Drihtne, & Aarones suna, þæs sacerdes, offrian þæs cealfes blod & geoton embutan þæt weofod þe is beforan þære halgan stowe dura.
& hyldon þa offrunga & ceorfan to sticcon.
& don fyr innan þæt weofod uppan þam sticceom þe ðær tosnidene beoþ, þæt heafod & ealle ða þingc ðe to þære lifre clyfiaþ.
& waxan þæt innewearde & þa <fet>; & se sacerd forbærne ða Drihtne to leohte & to wynsumum stence.
Gyf seo offrung þonne beo of sceapon oððe of gaton, bringe enytre offrunga & unwemme.
& offrie ða beforan Drihtne æt þæs weofodes sidan þe is on norþhealfe, & geoton Aarones suna þæt blod uppan þæt weofod ymbutan.
& todælon þa lima & þæt heafod & ealle þa þingc þe on þære lifre clifiað, & lecgon uppan þone wudu þe man þæt fyr sceal under don.
Waxan þonne þæt innewearde: & se sacerd bærnþ hit eall uppon ðam weofode to wynsumum swæcce.
Gyf seo offrung þonne biþ of fugelum, þonne bringe he turtlan & culfran briddas, & offrie se sacerd æt ðam weofode & bige þone swuran & læte yrnan þæt blod nyðer andlang þæs weofodes.
& wurpe þone cropp & þa feþera wiðæftan þæt weofod on easthealfe, on þære stowe þe man þa axan gyt.
Ætbrede of þa feþeru, næs ne ceorfe, & bærne hi uppan þam weofode Drihtne to offrunge & to wynsumum <swæcce>.

Þonne man bringe offrunge Drihtne, nime smedman & geote ele on uppan & stor, & bringe to Aarones sunum, þæs sacerdes, & nime heora an ane handfulle smedeman & eles & stores, & lecge uppan þæt weofod Drihtne to wurþunga.
& þæt þær to lafe bið, þæt bið Aarones & his bearna.
Bring clæne ofenbacene hlafas mid ele gesmyrede butan beorman.
Tobrec hi lytlum & geote ele on uppan.
Ne do man nanne beorman ne hunig to nanre offrunga.
Bringað dæl þærof & ne cume hit uppan þam weofode.
Þu scealt to ælcere offrunga.
Gyf he hryðeru offrian wille, bringe <unwemne> fearr oþþe heafare.
& setton Aarones suna heora handa uppan þære offrunga heafod, & <geoton> þæt blod ymbutan þæt weofod.
& bringon þone rysle, þe þa heortgesidu mid beoþ oferwrogen, to þam weofode, & eall þæt þærinne fættest sy & þa lundlagan mid hire rysle, & bærnon uppan þam weofode Drihtne to lace.
Gif he sceap bringe, ramm oððe eowe, syn hi unwemme.
Gyf he lamb bringe, Geoton Aarones suna his blod ymbutan þæt weofod.
& bringon Drihtne þone rysel & tægl & gelyndu.
& bærne se sacerd hit uppan þam weofode.
& gyf man gat offrige, do man on ða ylcan wisan.
Ælc rysel sceal Drihtne to leohte.
Ne ete ge naþer ne rysel ne blod.
Gyf se gehalgode sacerd syngað & deþ ðæt ðæt folc syngie, offrie Drihtne unwemme cealf.
& læde hit to þæs temples dura.
Nime þonne of þæs cealfes blode & sprencge seofon syþon on ðæs temples wahryft.
Gyf eall Israhela folc singað þurh ungewiss, bringe an cealf to þam temple, & læde hit to ðære dura.
& setton þæs folces ealdoran hyra handa uppan his heafod, & þonne þæt cealf geoffrod sy, nime se sacerd his blod, & dyppe his finger þæron & sprenge seofon syðon on þæt wahrift.
& smite of ðam sylfan blode on þæs weofodes hyrnan, & geote þæt þær to lafe bið æt ðam weofode nyðan.
& bærne þone rysel uppan þam weofode.
& gebidde se sacerd for hi.
& forbærne þæt cealf butan ðære wicstowe.
Gyf se ealdor syngað, bringe anne buccan to bote.
Gyf folces man syngað þurh nytennysse & his gilt undergyt, bringe ane gat to bote to ðam temole.
Gyf man wat þæt oðer man sweraþ, he bið scyldig gyf he hit forhylð.
Se man þe swerað man & eft his gilt ongyt bringe an cylferlamb to bote, oþþe gat, for hine & for his synne.
& gyf he nyten næbbe, bringe twa turtlan oððe twegen culfran briddas, ænne for þære synne, oþerne to offrunga.
Gyf he næbbe turtlan ne culfran, bringe melu.

Drihten spræc to Moyse, & þus cwæþ: Beod Aarone & his sunum þæt hi bringon Drihtne to offrunge, on ðam dæge þe hi man smyrað & halgað, melues ðone teoðan dæl þæs gemetes, ðe man nemneð ephi, healf ær undern, healf efer undern; þa sceolon beon elebacene & wearme.
Ne ete nan man of þæra sacerda offrunga, ac forbærne hi man ealle.
Drihten spræc to Moyse, & þus cwæþ: Ne ete nan man of ðære offrunga þe man Drihtne bringþ butan þa sacerdas & heora cynn.
& Gyf þær hwæt to lafe biþ ofer twegen dagas, forbærne hit man þæs ðriddan dæges.
Gyf hwa þæt smeru oþþe þæt blod ytt, þe bið Gode geoffrad, he sceal forwurðan.
Se swyðra boh & þa rib sceolon beon Aarones & his sunena of ðære offrunga þe man for gesibsumnysse offrað.
Drihten spræc to Moyse, & þus cwæþ: Nim Aaron & his suna & heora reaf & smyringele & an cealf for synne & twegen rammas & þeorfe hlafas.
& gadera eall folc to ðæs temples dura.
Moyses dyde swa Drihten him bebead, & cwæþ to þam folce: þis Drihten bebead.
He þwoh ða Aaron & his suna.
& scrydde ðone bisceop mid linenum reafe & gyrde hine & dyde ymbe hine blæhæwene tunecan & lede eaxclað ofer hine.
& band to ðam rationale, on ðam wæs awriten Lar & Soþfæstnys.
& band his heafod mid claðe & mid gehalgodan gyldenbende, swa Drihten him bebead.
& he nam ðone smyringcele, & smyrode ða halgan stowe & ðæt weofod & ealle heora fatu & halgode ðæt arfæt.
& he geat ele uppan Aarones heafod & smyrode hine & gehalgode.
& he scridde his suna midd & gyrde hi & hufode, swa Drihten bebead.
& brohte an cealf for synne, & Aaron & his suna setton heora handa uppan his heafod, & offrodon hit & smyrodon þæs weofodes hyrnan mid ðam blode, & guton ðæt þær to lafe wæs under ðæt weofod.
& bærndon ðone rysle & þa lundlagan uppan ðam weofode.
& ðæt cealf hi bærndon butan ðære wicstowe mid felle & mid flæsce, swa Drihten him bebead.
Hi offrodon anne ramm, & guton his blod ymbutan ðæt weofod.
& curfon ðone ram eall to sticceon.
& forbærndon uppan þam weofode, for ðan ðe he wæs Drihtnes offrung.
Ða Moyses ðone ramm offrode, he æthran mid ðam blode Aarones swyðre eare & his swyðran ðuman & ðæs wynstran fotes miclan tan.
Ða he ðus gedon hæfde, he geat ðæt blod uppan ðæt weofod, þe ðær to lafe wæs.
Ðone tægl & eall ðæt smeru & twegen lundlagan mid gelyndum, Hi forbærndon uppan ðam weofode.
& ða he hi ðus gehalgod hæfde, ða cwæð he: Seoðað eowwerne mete beforan ðæs temples dura & etað þær <þa>, swa Drihten bebead, & ðus cwæð: Ete Aaron & his suna.
& swa hwæt swa ðær to lafe beo, oððe of flæsce oððe of hlafe, forbærne man þæt.
Ne fare ge seofon dagon of ðære stowe durum.
Ac healdað ðær wearde dæges & nihtes, swa Drihten bebead.
Aaron & his suna dydon ealle ða þingc, ðe Drihten him bebead þurh Moysen.
Æfter seofon dagum, Moyses clypode Aaron & his suna & þa betstborenan of Israhela folce, & cwæð to him: Offriað an cealf & anne ram for synne, ægðer unwemme.
& beodað Israhela folce, þæt hi offrion for synne buccan & cealf & lamb, ælc anwintre & unwemme; & for sibsumnesse oxan & ramm: to dæg Drihten ætywð.
Hi namon þa ealle ða ðingc ðe Moyses him bebead, & brohton to ðæs temples dura.
& Moyses cwæð to þam folce: Wyrceað þæt Drihten eow bebead, & Drihten eow ætywð.
Ða Aaron geofrod hæfde & ðæt folc gebletsod, swa Moyses him bebead, ða eode he nyðer; ða ætywde Godes wuldor eallum þam folce.
& com fyr of Gode & forbærnde ealle ða ofrunga þe uppan þam weofode wæron; & ða þæt folc þæt geseah, þa feollon hi nyðer & heredon Drihten.
ÞA namon Aarones suna, Nadab & Abiud, heora storcyllan, & onældon þæron unhalgod fyr, ðæt him forboden wæs, beforan Gode.
& fyr com þærrihte & forbærnde hi to deaðe.
Þa swugode Aaron & wæs sarig.
Ða bead Moyses Missabele & Elifafan, Aczicheles sunum, Aarones fæderan, ðæt hi namon heora maga lic & bæron butan wicstowe.
& hi eodon sona & bæron hi aweg & wurpon hi ut, swa him beboden wæs.
Moyses cwæð to Aarone & to Eleazare & to Iðamare, his sunon: Forlætað eowre hreowsunga, ðe læs ge habbon Godes yrre.
Drihten spræc to Aarone & to his sunum: Ne drince ge nan ðingc ðæs ðe man mæg druncen of beon ðonne ge gan in to ðære halgan stowe, ðe læs ge swylton.
Drihten spræc to Moyse & to Aarone: Secgað Israhela bearnum, ðæt hi eton þa nytenu ðe heora clawa todælede beoð & ceowað.
Ne ete ge þa ðingc ðe ceowað & clawa ne todælað, swa olfend.
Hara & swyn synd forbodene to æthrinene.
Ne ete ge nanne fisc, buton ða þe habbað finnas & scylla.
Ða oþre synd unclæne.
Ne ete ge nan ðingc hafoccynnes ne earncynnes, Ne ulan, ne nan þingc hrefncynnes.
Ne hæme nan man wið his magan, Ne wiþ his mæges wif.
Healdað mine bebodu; ne do ge nan dingc ðe ða dydon, þe beforan eow wæron, ðe læs ge beon besmitene: ic eom Drihten eower God.
Arwurðiað eowerne fæder & eowre modor, & healdað mine fæstendagas.
Ne stel ðu, ne leoh ðu, ne beswic ðu ðinne nextan.
Ne swera ðu man on minum naman: ic eom Drihten.
Ne bysmra ðu ðinne mæg; nafa ðu ane niht unforgolden þæs weorc ðe ðe wyrce.
Ne wyrie ðu deafe; ne scremme ðu blinde; ondræd ðinne God.
Ne dem nan unriht; ne forseoh ðu ðearfan; ne arwurða þone rican; deme rihte ðinum nextan.
Ne beo ðu sacful.
Ne hata ðu þinne nextan on þinre heortan ac þrea hine openlice.
Ne tyn ðu þine neahgeburas; lufa þinne freond swa ðe sylfne: ic eom Drihten.
Healdað mine æ; ne do ðu þæt nytenu hæmon mid oþres cynnes nytenum: ne saw ðu ðinne æcer mid gemengdum sæde.
Ne ete ge þæra treowa bleda ðe ge plantiað, ær ðam fiftan geare.
Ne ete ge blod, ne ne gyman hwata ne swefna.
Ne ge eow ne efesion, ne beard ne sceron.
Ne læt ðu þine dohtor beon myltestre, þe læs ðin land sy mid mane gefylled.
Ne gym ðu drycræfta ne galdra.
Arwurðe ealdne man & ondræd þe ðinne God.
Ne hyrwe ge utancymene man, ac si he gemang eow swa inlendisc, & lufiað hine swa eow sylfe, for ðam ðe ge wæron utacymene on Egypta lande.
Habbað rihtne anmittan, & emne wæga & emne gemetu & sestras: ic eom Drihten, eower God, þe eow ælædde of Egypta lande.
Healdað mine bebodu & mine domas.
Gyf ænig man gelyfe on Moloches hearh, swelte he deaðe; hæne hine man mid stanum.
Gyf hwa wirigð his fæder & his modor, he sceal sweltan.
Se man þe bega wiccecræft, swelte he deaðe.
Drihten spræc to Moyse, & ðus cwæð: Sege Israhela folce; þis synd ða dagas, ðe ge sceolon Drihtne halgian & wurðian.
On ðam feowerteoðan dæge þes forman monðes on æfen bið Drihtnes færeld.
& ðonne ge in cumað on þæt land þe ic eow sylle, ne ripe ge to clæne, ne ge ne gaderian ða ear þe bæfton eow beoð, ac lætað ðearfan & utancymene hi lesan.

Sum Egyptisc man gestrynde sunu be Israheliscon wife onmang Israhela folce; þa flat he wið anne Israheliscne man, & hyrwde Godes naman & wirigde hine; þa lædde hine man to Moyse His modor hatte Salomith, Dabrius dohtor, of Danes cynne, & hig dydon hine on cweartern, oð hi wiston hwæt Drihten be him tæhte.

Ða cwæð Drihten to Moyse: Læd ut þone hyruwend wiðutan þa wicstowe, & setton ealle ða þe his word gehyrdon heora handa uppan his heafod, & oftorfie eall ðæt folc hine: & cweð to Israhela folce: Se mann ðe wyrigð Drihtnes naman, swelte he deaðe.
Se ðe man ofslyhð oþþe gewundað, he sceal sweltan.
Se ðe orf ofslyhð, gilde heafod wið heafde.
Gif neahgebur wið oþerne agylte, do him man ðæt ylce ðæt he ðam oðrum dyde.
Gylde eage mid <eagan> & toð mid teð, si he landes man, sy he utlendisc.
Israhela bearn dydon swa Drihten Moyse bebead.
Drihten spræc to Moyse on Synai dune, & cwæð: Sprec to Israhela folce ðas word; þonne ge inn cumað on ðæt land þe ic eow sylle, freolsiað Drihtnes restendæg.
Syx gear ðu scealt sawan & wyrcean ðinne wingeard & gaderian heora wæstmas.
Ðæt seofoðe gear ðæt land bið freoh þurh Drihtnes gyfe; ne saw ðu þonne, ne ne rip, ne ðinne wingeard ne wyrc.
Ne heora wæstmas ne gadera þonne hi weaxað sylfwilles, for þam ðe hit bið restengear.
& þæt fifteoðe gear bið halig & forgyfenesse gear; on ðam forgyfennysse geare man sceall freogean ælcne ðeowan, butan he fram his halforde nelle.
Gyf he þonne fram his hlaforde nelle, læde man hine to þæs temples dura, & þyrlie his eare mid anum æle, & beo he æfre syððan ðeow.
Ne swenceað eowre magas: ondrædað eowerne Drihten, eowerne God.
Healdað mine bebodu & mine domas, ðæt ge libbon eower lif butan ælcere sorhge.
Gyf hwa þonne cwyð: Hwæt ete we on þam seofoðan geare, gyf we ne sawað ne ne gaderiað ure wæstmas?
Ic eow sylle mine bletsunga, ðæt an gear bringð ðreora geara wæstmas.
Sawað on þam eahtoðan geare, & etað ealde wæstmas of ðæt nygoðe gear & of niwe cumað.
Ne sylle ge ðæt land on ece yrfe, for þam ðe hit is min, & ge syndon utancymene & mine tilian.
Gyf ðin wanspediga mæg beo mid ðe, ne nim ðu na mare æt him to hyre ðonne ðu sealdest.
Ne syle ðu ðin feoh to hyre.
Þeah ðin nexta for his yrmðe gange on ðeowet, nafa ðu hine for wealh ac for medgyldan.
Hi synd mine ðeowas & ic hi gelædde of Egypta lande.
Nabbon ge wealas ne wylna of eowrum cynne, ac of ðam ðeodum ðe eow abuton synd, & of utancymenum.
Israhela bearn synd mine ðeowan, ðe ic ut alædde of Egypta lande.
IC eom Drihten eowwer God; Ne wyrce ge eow hearga ne agrafene godas: ic eom Drihten.
Gyf ge healdað mine beboda, ic eow sylle fulle wæstmas & ge etað to fylle & ge eardiað butan ege on eowrum lande.
& ic sylle sibbe on eowrum gemærum & ge beoð butan brogan; ic afyrre yfele wildeor & gewin fram eow.
Ge feohtað wið eowre fynd & hi hreosað beforan eow.
Fif eowre fliað heora hundteontig, & hundteontig eowre <fliað> heora tyn ðusenda; eowre fynd feallað beforan eow.
Ic eow geseo, & do ðæt ge weaxað; & ge beoð gemænifylde, & ic fæstnie min wed mid eow.
Ge etað ealde mettas oð eow niwe cumon.
Ic sette mine halgan stowe tomiddes eowre, & ne awurpe ic eow.
Ac ic ga betwux eow, & ic beo eower God & ge beoð min folc.
Ic eom Drihten eower Godd, ðe eow ut alædde of Egypta lande, ðæt ge me ðeowodon; & ic eom se ðe tobræc ða racyntan ymbutan eowrum swuran & alysde eow.

Gyf ge me ne gehyrað & mine bebodu forhogiaþ, & mine æ & mine domas forseoð, & ne doð min wedd for naht, ic gedo eow ðas ðingc: ic sende hrædlice fyr & gewyrce eow to wædlan; on idel ge swincað & eowre fynd his brucað.
Ic wiðstande ongean eow, & ge feallað beforan eowrum feondum & ge hyrað ðam ðe eow hatiaþ; ge fleoð þeah eow man ne drife.
Ic eow do seofonfealdne ege.
& ic forbrece eowre ofermodignysse heardnysse, & ic gedo ðæt eow bið ægðer heard ge heofone ge eorðe.
& eall eowre geswinc beoð idele; ne bringð seo eorðe eow nane wæstmas.
& ic sende on eow wildeor, þæt forspillon eow & eowre nytenu.
Gyf ge nellað onfon mine lare, & gað ongean me, ic ga ongen eow & slea eow.
& þonne ge fleoð fram byrig to byrig, ic sende cwealm on eow, & hungor, swa ðæt fif bacað on anum ofne, & ge etað hlaf be gewihte & ge ne beoð fulle.
& ic witnige eow seofon witon, swa ðæt ge etað eowre suna & eowre dohtra flæsc.

& ic towurpe eowre heagan getimbru, & eowre hearga ic tobrece, & ge feallað betwux eowrum deofolgyldum & ic onscunige eow, swa ðæt ic do eowre burga weste & eowra stowe, & ic fordo eow, & eowre fynd wafiað eower.
Ic todrife eow, & þæt land lið on reste, for ðan ðe hit ne reste ða hwile ðe ge ðæron wunodon.
& ða þe þær to lafe beoð, ða beoð on swa miclum ege, þæt hi fleoð leafes sweg swylce hit swurd sy; hi feallað, þeah hi nan man ne slea, & fleoð, ðeah him nan man wið ne feohte.
& for eowrum agenum gilte ge beoð geswencte, oð ðæt ge andettan eowre synna & eower yldrena, mid ðam hi me gremedon & eodon ongen me.
& ic ga ongean eow, & læde eow on feonda land, oþ eower lyðre mod ablysige; ðonne gebidde ge for eowrum arleasnyssum.
& ic <gime> min wedd, ðe ic behet Abrahame & Isaace & Iacobe.
Ic gyme ðæs landes, þonne ge hit forlætað; hit licað me, þeah hit weste sy.
Ic eom Drihten eower God, ðe eow ut alædde of Egypta lande beforan ealles folces gesyhðe; ðis synd ða bebodu & domas & laga, ðe Drihten gesette betwux him & Israhela folce on Sinai dune.
